title: Ultimate One Direction Quiz - Part 10
description: Test your knowledge of One Direction's early days, X Factor journey, and the beginning of their career with these 50 challenging questions!

questions.question: In which year did One Direction form on The X Factor?
Who suggested putting the five boys together as a group on The X Factor?
What was the first song One Direction performed together on The X Factor?
Which member of One Direction auditioned with 'Isn't She Lovely' by Stevie Wonder?
What place did One Direction finish in The X Factor competition?
Who was One Direction's mentor on The X Factor?
What was the name of One Direction's first headline tour?
In which month of 2010 was One Direction formed?
What was One Direction's first single after The X Factor?
Which member of One Direction auditioned with 'So Sick' by Ne-Yo?
What was the title of One Direction's first album?
In which city did Harry Styles work in a bakery before auditioning for The X Factor?
What was One Direction's first UK number one single?
Which member of One Direction auditioned with 'Plain White T's' Hey There Delilah'?
What was the name of the band Liam Payne was in before One Direction?
questions.answer: Liam Payne was not in a band before One Direction

questions.question: In which month of 2011 was One Direction's first single released?
What was One Direction's first US number one album?
Which member of One Direction auditioned with 'Your Song' by Elton John?
What was the second single released from One Direction's first album?
In which year did One Direction sign with Syco Records?
What was the name of One Direction's first book?
questions.answer: One Direction: Forever Young (Our Official X Factor Story)

questions.question: Which member of One Direction auditioned with 'Let Me Love You' by Mario?
What was One Direction's first performance after The X Factor?
In which month of 2011 was One Direction's first album released?
What was the title of One Direction's first DVD?
questions.answer: Up All Night: The Live Tour

What was the name of One Direction's first concert film?
In which city did One Direction form during The X Factor?
What was One Direction's first song to reach number one in Ireland?
Which member of One Direction was the last to join the group on The X Factor?
What was the name of One Direction's first world tour?
In which month of 2010 did One Direction first perform live on The X Factor?

questions.answer: Best British Single at the 2012 BRIT Awards
